_description: Three lines in a Latin sermon — three monorhyming lines

OxfMagd93.Transcription:
redeliche withouten lettyngwyseliche withouten stumlyngSothliche
                    withowten faynyng
OxfMagd93.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus codicum mss. qui in collegiis aulisque
                oxoniensibus….
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1852: 50.
